short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paying invoices with a single click
short.sv: Betala dina fakturor med en enkelt klick

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your personal finance

Collect all your invoices in one place. 
- Receive them electronically or scan them with your smartphone. 
- Mobile app for Android available - and iPhone coming soon.

Organize your invoices for quick overview and increased control. 
- With Pay2n you can feel secure that no invoices are forgotten or overdue.

Pay your invoices with a single click, independently of what Internet bank you use.
- Finally you do not have to enter long reference numbers manually.
- The web browser extensions gives you quick access to your invoices!
